headline: Will Surging AI and Modernization Demand Shift EPAM Systems' (EPAM) Investment Story?
summary: EPAM Systems recently reported Q3 2025 results that surpassed expectations for both adjusted earnings per share and revenue, while raising its full-year adjusted EPS outlook and projected revenue growth due to strong demand in AI, cloud, automation, and modernization. Despite continuing to generate strong free cash flow, EPAM has faced concerns over a decline in return on invested capital, highlighting questions about the profitability of its latest investments. We'll explore how EPAM's...
